IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROMOTE PUBLIC AWARENESS OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS AND THEIR VALUE, PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT FOR STAFF AND TRUSTEES, AND COLLABORATION AMONG MEMBERS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROMOTE PUBLIC AWARENESS OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS AND THEIR VALUE, PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT FOR STAFF AND TRUSTEES, AND COLLABORATION AMONG ITS MEMBERS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE PROGRAMS AND SERVICES TO INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS AND PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR FACULTY DEVELOPMENT, ENRICHMENT PROGRAMS, AND PROVIDE LEADERSHIP TRAINING FOR ADMINISTRATORS AND TRUSTEES OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS. ALSO, EDUCATE AND INFORM THE GENERAL PUBLIC ABOUT THE BENEFITS OF INDEPENDENT EDUCATION AND SERVE AS A CLEARINGHOUSE OF INFORMATION ABOUT MEMBER SCHOOLS AND ABOUT INDEPENDENT EDUCATION IN GENERAL.

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE SAINT MICHAEL SCHOOL OF CLAYTON
VILLA DUCHESNE AND OAK HILL SCHOOL
CHURCHILL CENTER & SCHOOL FOR LEARNING DISABILITIES
CITY MONTESSORI ADOLESCENT PROGRAM ST LOUIS
MONTESSORI LAB SCHOOL AT GRAND CENTER

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE WALDORF SCHOOL AND MONTESSORI LAB SCHOOL AT GRAND CENTER WERE ADDED TO THE INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS OF ST. LOUIS' LIST OF SUPPORTED ORGANIZATIONS. CHESTERFIELD DAY SCHOOL AND THE FULTON SCHOOL MERGED AND ARE KNOWN AS THE FULTON SCHOOL. INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS OF ST.LOUIS NOW SUPPORTS 46 ORGANIZATIONS.
INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS OF ST.LOUIS MAINTAINS MEMBERSHIP REQUIREMENTS IN THE BYLAWS. THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATIONS MAY CHANGE YEAR OVER YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (THE "CODE"), EXCEPT ON NET INCOME DERIVED FROM UNRELATED BUSINESS ACTIVITIES AS DEFINED IN THE CODE. ACCORDINGLY, THE ORGANIZATION FILES AS A TAX EXEMPT ORGANIZATION. THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS GUIDANCE ISSUED BY THE FASB ON ACCOUNTING FOR INCOME TAXES AND HAS EVALUATED ITS TAX POSITIONS, EXPIRING STATUTES OF LIMITATIONS, AUDITS, PROPOSED SETTLEMENTS, CHANGES IN TAX LAW AND NEW AUTHORITATIVE RULINGS, AND BELIEVES THAT NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS NECESSARY TO COVER ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THE ORGANIZATION'S RETURNS FOR TAX YEARS 2018 AND LATER REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS OF ST. LOUIS IS MADE UP OF MEMBER SCHOOLS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES CONSISTS OF HEADS OF MEMBER SCHOOLS. THE COMMITTEE ON TRUSTEES WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR NOMINATING NEW MEMBERS OF THE BOARD. NOMINATIONS MUST BE APPROVED FIRST BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND THEN BY THE MEMBERSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND BOARD PRIOR TO ITS FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH YEAR AT THE FALL BOARD MEETING, BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS AN ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW OF THE WORK OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR CONDUCTED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND DELIVERED TO THE EXECTIVE DIRECTOR BY THE PRESIDENT. AS SET OUT IN THE BYLAWS OF THE ORGANIZATION, THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE DETERMINES COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE ORGANIZATION WITH THE USE OF INPUT FROM THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. A COMPARISON TO OTHER NON-PROFIT INDEPENDENT SCHOOL ASSOCIATIONS IS PERIODICALLY PERFORMED AND UTILIZED TO ESTABLISH COMPENSATION. THIS IS DOCUMENTED IN AN ANNUAL CONTRACT. THERE ARE NO OTHER COMPENSATED OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES, AND STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION DID NOT CHANGE ITS PROCESS DURING THE FISCAL YEAR.
